23 struct ADouble
24 {
25  double vr;
26 
27  _AI ADouble() {}
28  _AI ADouble(const ADouble& d) : vr(d.vr) {}
29  _AI ADouble(const AScalar& s) : vr(s.fr) {}
30  _AI ADouble(double a) : vr(a) {}
31  _AI ADouble(int32_t i) : vr(i) {}
32 
33  _AI ADouble& operator= (const ADouble& d) {vr = d.vr; return *this;}

41  _AI ADouble operator- (const ADouble& x) const {return vr - x.vr;}
42  _AI ADouble operator- () const {return -vr;}
43  _AI ADouble operator/ (const ADouble& x) const {return vr / x.vr;}

57  _AI ADouble operator<< (int x) const {return vr * pow(2.0, x);}
58  _AI ADouble operator>> (int x) const {return vr * pow(2.0, -x);}

60  _AI ADouble& operator<<= (int x) {vr = vr * pow(2.0, x); return *this;}
61  _AI ADouble& operator>>= (int x) {vr = vr * pow(2.0, -x); return *this;}
62 
63  _AI ADouble inverse() const {return 1.0 / vr;}
64  _AI ADouble d_invsqrt() const {return sqrt(1.0 / vr);}
65 
66  _AI ADouble mul_add(const ADouble& x, const ADouble& y) const {
67  return vr + x.vr * y.vr;
68  }
69  _AI ADouble mul_sub(const ADouble& x, const ADouble& y) const {
70  return vr - x.vr * y.vr;
71  }
72  _AI ADouble& mul_acc(const ADouble& x, const ADouble& y) {
73  vr += x.vr * y.vr;
74  return *this;
75  }
76  _AI ADouble& mul_dec(const ADouble& x, const ADouble& y) {
77  vr -= x.vr * y.vr;
78  return *this;
79  }
80 
81  _AI ADouble abs() const {return fabs(vr);}
82  _AI ADouble max(const ADouble& x) const {return fmax(vr, x.vr);}
83  _AI ADouble min(const ADouble& x) const {return fmin(vr, x.vr);}
84  _AI ADouble clamp(const ADouble& low, const ADouble& high) const {
85  return max(low).min(high);
86  }
87 
88  _AI static ADouble MinusOne() {return -1;}
89  _AI static ADouble Zero() {return 0;}
90  _AI static ADouble One() {return 1;}

92  _AI static ADouble Three() {return 3;}
93  _AI static ADouble Half() {return 0.5;}
